SSIndex 0.0.0.9003
  • Reference
  • Articles
    • Using the SSIndex package

    SSIndex

    SSIndex provides R codes for the manuscript “Statistical inference on shape- and size-indexes for counting processes”

    Installation

    Install and load the package from GitHub using

    devtools::install_github("stc04003/SSIndex", ref = "main")
library(SSIndex)

    Online documentation

    Online document includes:

    • Examples on generating data and fitting the proposed model
